name: MINDTIME
description:
Once upon a melancholy night..

Two crazy scientists has gathered...

Together...

Under one united ensign to challenge humanity ....

By breaking the laws of logic and imposing the laws of insanity...

To accomplish this impossible mission..

Or is it..?

MINDTIME is a turn-based game with time limit

Use the cards to manipulate time and win

Abdullah Alzeer - Programming & Game design

Rinad AlShumrani - Programming

Abdulmalik kazli - Art

Hajer Abbas - Story
